attributes.action: To examine a not-for-profit, interest-free, Co-operative economic system
attributes.additional_details:
More can be found in the papers' section at www.interestfreemoney.org

- Including the 'CCPA Reader on Co-operative Socialism'.

For this Petition, we have created a new web-site, www.co-operativesocialism.org to cover five policy areas:

Why and How
Land Issues
Workplace Issues
Money, Finance and Banking Issues
Income Issues

'Co-operative Socialism: a set of policies to help create the co-operative commonwealth: a world of human and ecological co-operative relationships.'
attributes.background:
A radically-different economic system, rather than capitalism, is needed: to create a peaceful, prosperous and sustainable world.

This Petition, therefore, invites all Members to consider the plan for Co-operative Socialism, details of which are collected at a relevant Occupy London web-page.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
